languages.text: "Ровнять служительницу Бога-Императора и этого еретика — само по себе ересь!"
"To equate a true servant of the God-Emperor with this apostate is a heresy unto itself!"
languages.original_text: "Ровнять служительницу Бога-Императора и этого еретика — само по себе ересь!"

traits.locale_text: "To equate a servant of the God-Emperor with this heretic is heresy all by itself!"
"To equate a servant of the God-Emperor with this heretic is heresy all by itself!"
"To equate a true servant of the God-Emperor with this apostate is a heresy unto itself!"
"To equate a true servant of the God-Emperor with this apostate is a heresy unto itself!"
"To equate a true servant of the God-Emperor with this apostate is a heresy unto itself!"
"To equate a true servant of the God-Emperor with this apostate is a heresy unto itself!"

languages.text: "Einen wahren Diener des Gottimperators mit diesem Apostaten gleichzusetzen, ist eine Ketzerei in sich selbst!"
languages.original_text: "To equate a true servant of the God-Emperor with this apostate is a heresy unto itself!"

traits.locale_text: "Einen wahren Diener des Gottimperators mit diesem Apostaten gleichzusetzen, ist eine Ketzerei in sich selbst!"

languages.text: «¡Comparar a un verdadero siervo del Dios Emperador con este apóstata es una herejía en sí misma!».
languages.original_text: "To equate a true servant of the God-Emperor with this apostate is a heresy unto itself!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Comparar a un verdadero siervo del Dios Emperador con este apóstata es una herejía en sí misma!».

languages.text: 「真の神帝陛下の従者とこの背教者を同列に扱うこと自体が異端だ」
languages.original_text: "To equate a true servant of the God-Emperor with this apostate is a heresy unto itself!"

traits.locale_text: 「真の神帝陛下の従者とこの背教者を同列に扱うこと自体が異端だ」

languages.text: “把神皇的忠仆与这个叛乱分子相提并论，这种想法本身就是异端恶行！”
languages.original_text: "To equate a true servant of the God-Emperor with this apostate is a heresy unto itself!"

traits.locale_text: “把神皇的忠仆与这个叛乱分子相提并论，这种想法本身就是异端恶行！”

languages.text: « Assimiler une fidèle servante de l'Empereur-Dieu à cet apostat relève de l'hérésie la plus pure ! »
languages.original_text: "To equate a true servant of the God-Emperor with this apostate is a heresy unto itself!"

traits.locale_text: « Assimiler une fidèle servante de l'Empereur-Dieu à cet apostat relève de l'hérésie la plus pure ! »

languages.text: "Tanrı İmparator'un gerçek bir hizmetkârını bu dönekle denk tutmak bile başlı başına kâfirliktir!"
languages.original_text: "To equate a true servant of the God-Emperor with this apostate is a heresy unto itself!"
